com.appglu
Interface UserSessionPersistence

All Known Implementing Classes:
MemoryUserSessionPersistence, SharedPreferencesUserSessionPersistence
public interface UserSessionPersistence

Strategy for keeping track of the authenticated mobile application User.
When UserOperations.signup(User) or UserOperations.login(String, String) are called the User will be saved using saveAuthenticatedUser(User).
When UserOperations.logout() is called then the User will be removed using logout().

Since:
1.0.0
See Also:
UserOperations, MemoryUserSessionPersistence
